title: Business tax cut shifts SRAS right

content.question: Which of the following will happen if a countryâ€™s government reduces business taxes?

choices.label: The short-run Phillips curve will shift to the right.
The short-run aggregate supply curve will shift to the right.
The long-run aggregate supply curve will shift to the left.
The aggregate demand curve will shift to the left.
The demand curve for loanable funds will shift to the left.

content.answer: The short-run aggregate supply curve will shift to the right.
